Title: Relates to assessments of residential cooperative, condominium and rental property
Summary: Relates to assessments of residential cooperative, condominium and rental property; defines the term "the assessment which would be placed upon such parcel were the parcel not owned or leased by a cooperative corporation or on a condominium basis".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to assessments of residential cooperative, condominium and rental property
